translations: n.干燥植物标本集；植物标本室，存放盒（柜）（herbarium 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Scientists in the West are now able to receive specimens, including types from Chinese herbaria.
sentences.translation: 现在，西方的科学家可以收到来自中国标本馆的标本，包括模式标本。

sentences.sentence: More modestly, those involved in Herbaria@home scrutinise and decipher scanned images of handwritten notes about old plant cuttings stored in British museums.
sentences.translation: 另外还有一些更适合大众参与的项目，比如参与Herbaria@home项目的爱好者需要对一些有关远古植物切片的记录手稿的扫描图片进行辨认，这些手稿都是大英博物馆的藏品。
